testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our satisfied customers about their experience with ﾃ僕fﾃｶng
testimonials.review1: Excellent selection of Icelandic beers and wines. Fast delivery and great customer service. Highly recommended!
testimonials.review2: ﾃ僕fﾃｶng has become my go-to place for quality beverages. The delivery is always on time and the products are top-notch.
testimonials.review3: Amazing variety and competitive prices. The staff is knowledgeable and the online ordering is seamless.

demoData.title: Demo Data Management
demoData.description: Insert or remove sample demo data for testing and development purposes.
demoData.customersDescription: Sample customer accounts with realistic Icelandic names and contact information.
demoData.addressesDescription: Shipping addresses in Reykjavﾃｭk for each demo customer.
demoData.ordersDescription: Sample orders with various statuses, shipping methods, and product combinations.
demoData.orderItemsDescription: Individual items within orders, linking products to orders with quantities and prices.
demoData.warningMessage: Demo data operations will affect your live database. Use with caution in production environments.
demoData.insertError: Failed to insert demo data. Please try again.
demoData.removeError: Failed to remove demo data. Please try again.
demoData.insertNote: Inserts sample customers, addresses, orders, and order items into the database.
demoData.removeNote: Removes all demo data (customers with demo_ prefix, their addresses, orders, and order items).
